Transforming from a desk to a lectern via a unique pneumatic gas lift operation pedal tested over 10,000 cycles, I am two tables in one! product.title: Single Sided Electric T Sit Stand Workstation - Black Frame [1200L x 800W] - white
product.product-description:
Do you ever feel like you've been sitting for hours, as your back and neck slowly give out on you, cramping up? Your posture is failing you and you see yourself slowly slipping into bad habits? Start making the right decisions, with my help! I am a one sided electric height adjustable table. My simple design utilises a one button press mechanism that will get you up on your feet in no time, to ensure there is no disruption to work flow. Increasing blood flow and circulation, you are able to work for longer periods of time and continue to put your best work forward. Research has shown the detrimental effects of sitting for increasingly long hours on both your physical and mental health. So get the office back on the right track! Coming in a variety of colours; white, maple and wenge - I am sure to suit any space you slot me into. If my black frameÂ isn't right for you, have a look at my white frame.

Do you ever feel like you've been sitting for hours, as your back and neck slowly give out on you, cramping up? Your posture is failing you and you see yourself slowly slipping into bad habits? My simple design utilises a one button press mechanism that will get you up on your feet in no time, to ensure there is no disruption to work flow. Increasing blood flow and circulation, you are able to work for longer periods of time and continue to put your best work forward. Research has shown the detrimental effects of sitting for increasingly long hours on both your physical and mental health. So get the office back on the right track! Coming in a variety of colours; white, maple and wenge - I am sure to suit any space.

product.title: Vertical Under Desk Power - 4 power and 2 data outlets
product.product-description:
The combined vertical power and data mechanism is a great solution for someone who constantly has stuff on top their desktop. It fits perfectly underneath a desk and workstation ensuring that all of your wiring is underneath your desk. This particular system goes hand in hand with a single cable management tray that also fits under your desk. The combination of the two will really keep the wiring from hanging loose and give your office a sharper look.

product.title: Vision Chart - Communication Room Divider - 1800 x 900
product.product-description:
Looking for a simple, yet effective way to turn an open plan space into a focused, concentrated and efficient work space? Look no further. As a double partition, I offer a magnetic whiteboard on one side and a charcoal pinnable fabric on the other - providing for all your creative needs. Fitted with large lockable wheels, I sure make it easy to manouver over any surface. I am also equipped with a magnetic pen shelf and two flip chart hooks to hold notes, ideas or anything you may require. If one double-sided partition just isn't enough, I am easily attachable to a second one, just like me, through a simple complementary connector piece! Easily linked and detached and I am able to create many office space shapes, for both focused and attentice or abstract working. When you're done, simply roll me back into storage or change my shape for tomorrow!

Assembly required

Yes

Tools required

Hand drill

5
